trans-unit.source: The Create User(s) operation creates one or more new users in the directory.
trans-unit.target: The Create User(s) operation creates one or more new users in the directory.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>immutableId</embeddedLabel> property was added to a <link xlink:href="6b0f847b-831b-474d-9189-78af89ee7977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">User</link> object for requests using version 2013-11-08 or newer.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>immutableId</embeddedLabel> property was added to a <link xlink:href="6b0f847b-831b-474d-9189-78af89ee7977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">User</link> object for requests using version 2013-11-08 or newer.

trans-unit.source: When creating a user with version 2013-11-08 or newer, this property must be specified if the userPrincipalName (UPN) includes a federated domain.
trans-unit.target: When creating a user with version 2013-11-08 or newer, this property must be specified if the userPrincipalName (UPN) includes a federated domain.

trans-unit.source: The request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <parameterReference>mytenantdomain</parameterReference> with the domain of your Azure Active Directory tenant, such as <parameterReference>contoso.onmicrosoft.com</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: Replace <parameterReference>mytenantdomain</parameterReference> with the domain of your Azure Active Directory tenant, such as <parameterReference>contoso.onmicrosoft.com</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>api-version</parameterReference> query string parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>api-version</parameterReference> query string parameter is required.

trans-unit.source: The examples in this topic use the tenant domain to address the tenant.
trans-unit.target: The examples in this topic use the tenant domain to address the tenant.

trans-unit.source: For other ways of addressing the tenant, see <link xlink:href="5b0f3e3d-f96e-4b5b-864d-fc7c6b185097" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Addressing Aliases</link>.
trans-unit.target: For other ways of addressing the tenant, see <link xlink:href="5b0f3e3d-f96e-4b5b-864d-fc7c6b185097" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Addressing Aliases</link>.

trans-unit.source: A bearer token issued by Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: A bearer token issued by Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: See <legacyLink xlink:href="874839d9-6de6-43aa-9a5c-613b0c93247e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Scenarios for Azure AD</legacyLink> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <legacyLink xlink:href="874839d9-6de6-43aa-9a5c-613b0c93247e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Scenarios for Azure AD</legacyLink> for more information.

trans-unit.source: The media type of the content in the request body.
trans-unit.target: The media type of the content in the request body.

trans-unit.source: The length of the request in bytes.
trans-unit.target: The length of the request in bytes.

trans-unit.source: One or more <embeddedLabel>User</embeddedLabel> entities with the minimum properties specified in the <link xlink:href="6b0f847b-831b-474d-9189-78af89ee7977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">User</link> topic.
trans-unit.target: One or more <embeddedLabel>User</embeddedLabel> entities with the minimum properties specified in the <link xlink:href="6b0f847b-831b-474d-9189-78af89ee7977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">User</link> topic.

trans-unit.source: The password specified must meet the tenant’s password complexity requirements.
trans-unit.target: The password specified must meet the tenant’s password complexity requirements.

trans-unit.source: For more information about password complexity requirements, see the <link xlink:href="6b0f847b-831b-474d-9189-78af89ee7977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">User</link> topic.
trans-unit.target: For more information about password complexity requirements, see the <link xlink:href="6b0f847b-831b-474d-9189-78af89ee7977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">User</link> topic.

trans-unit.source: The sample request below shows the minimum properties required to successfully create a user.
trans-unit.target: The sample request below shows the minimum properties required to successfully create a user.

trans-unit.source: The following sample request creates a new user in the directory using version 2013-04-05:
trans-unit.target: The following sample request creates a new user in the directory using version 2013-04-05:

trans-unit.source: The following sample request creates a new user in the directory using version 2013-11-08, specifying the <system>immutableId</system> property:
trans-unit.target: The following sample request creates a new user in the directory using version 2013-11-08, specifying the <system>immutableId</system> property:

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code <embeddedLabel>201 Created</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code <embeddedLabel>201 Created</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the created User, which includes an Object Id.
trans-unit.target: The URI of the created User, which includes an Object Id.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the server that performed the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: The identifier for the server that performed the requested operation.

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the current session with the directory service.
trans-unit.target: The key that identifies the current session with the directory service.

trans-unit.source: The following sample response is received when the sample request above is sent.
trans-unit.target: The following sample response is received when the sample request above is sent.
